Title: Fear, Itself
Plot: To help Buffy get over the pain of having been used by Parker, the gang head to a fraternity Halloween party expecting a few cheap scares and a bit of harmless fun. Unfortunately, some accidental magic turns the party into a house of horrors where everyone's fears come to life.
GuestStars: Larissa Reynolds, Adam Grimes, Michele Nordin, Darris Love, Aldis Hodge, Adam Bitterman, Walter Jones, Sulo Williams, Marc Rose, Kristine Sutherland, Marc Blucas, Emma Caulfield, Adam Kaufman, Lindsay Crouse
